title: shollu pAppA
sahitya:
1.  shollu pAppA shollu pAppA subramaNyam enru shollu pAppA
allum paghalum namadallarpiNi ozhiya amudan peyarai mulaiyamudarundum nAL mudal
 caraNam 2    nillu pAppA nillu pAppA nIti neriyil nilai nillu pAppA
tillaiyADi pudhlvan valliyam maiyODezhil deivAnaiyum pullum shelvan tiruvaDiyil
 caraNam 3    kollu pAppA kollu pAppA koDiya kAmanai veTTik-kollu pAppA
kallinuLLum pughuvAn kATrirkkaDu naDaiyAn kaLvanaiyE muLaiyirk-kiLLi erindavanai
 caraNam 4    Aru pAppA Aru pAppA Arumukhavan ivan Aru pAppA
vEri malarp-padamum vElum ayilum minna veTri mayilAn nigar aTra azhagan ivan
 caraNam 5    pAru pAppA pAru pAppA bhavappashi tIra ninru pAru pAppA
pOrum alaindhu kAnal nIrai arundi dAham tIrumO mellaDiyil shOri varumE vEndAm
 caraNam 6    ADu pAppA ADu pAppA avanum nIyumAi viLaiyADu pAppA
kUDip-piriyAn guhan kOzhik-kodi udaiyAn vIdu taruvAn tani veTTa veLiyil kuDitt-
